properties.name: encrypt.secret
properties.description: AES秘钥,当所选加密类型为AES时必填(AES secret key, which must be filled in when the selected encryption type is AES)

properties.name: encrypt.publicKey
properties.description: RSA公钥,当所选加密类型为RSA时必填(RSA public key, which must be filled in when the selected encryption type is RSA)

properties.name: encrypt.privateKey
properties.description: RSA私钥,当所选加密类型为RSA时必填(RSA private key, which must be filled in when the selected encryption type is RSA)

properties.name: encrypt.order
properties.description: 过滤器启动序号(Filter Start Sequence Number)

properties.name: encrypt.sortSignSecret
properties.description: 参数排序加密秘钥,当使用@SortSignEncrypt功能时必填(Parameter sort encryption key, required when using @sortsignencrypt function)

properties.name: encrypt.debug
properties.description: 是否启用debug模式(Whether debug mode is enabled)
